adhara śrīmān muniśārdūlas tatsabhāyām anekadevanāgayakṣādisaṃmilite naikagiram ājñāṃ nāvabhāṣitaṃ kim / kimabhilāṣo bhavasi subhūte yathābhiprāyas tathā vijñāpaya śākyamunau / subhūtir āha / narāṇām uttamaṃ vrataṃ yad ahorātravrataṃ vratarāja
mahodayaṃ mamābhilāṣaḥ / ity ukte mahānumataṃ sādaraṃ kṛtvā vaj
adharo bhagavantam evam āha / bhagavan muniśārdūla giram ekam api nāvabhāṣitam / sarvasabhājanānām abhilaṣitaṃ subhūtir iti vratarāja
mahodayaṃ yad ahorātravratopāyikām abhilāṣiko 'ham ity āha / tat sakalaṃ prabhāṣaya tvaṃ munīśvara /

body.text: Avk_P_5. purātanīkāle uttaradigbhāge dharmapattano nāma mahānagarī āsīd maghavatpattanasamā sujana-m-uttamaiḥ paripūritā / kathaṃ vistāritā nagarī / saptayojanasaṃvṛtā vyāyāmavistīrṇā bhavati .... tālapaṅktibhiḥ parikhābhiś ca parirundhyamānā mahotsavā / tadūrdhvaṃ trikūṭaparvato 'sti / nānāvṛkṣasamākīrṇaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇasadārataṃ nānākusumasugandhavāsitam anekarṣibhiḥ suvāsitaṃ trikūṭam eva / anekaśūrasamākīrṇānekavidvajjanāvṛtā nānāśilpajñasamāpannā bhiṣagvaraprabhṛtinānāsupuruṣaparipūrṇā bhavati nagarī kālavedīkālajñasamayajñacaittajñamantrīsamāpannā ca /
Avk_P_6. tasyāṃ nagaryāṃ dharmadakṣo nāma rājā babhūva nayavinayavivekavidhijñaḥ prajāvatsalasvabhāvaḥ paraduḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vā svātmani vedanīyo dayāvān dharmatrāṇadharmaparāyaṇa

children.text: / tasya patnī suvratī sadā dharmacāriṇī vidyāguṇasaṃpannā /

body.text: Avk_P_7. atha tasmin samaye tatra trikūṭaparvate śāriputro nāma mahātmāyuṣmān jainajño buddhajñānavidāṃ varo viharati / tadā śāriputro 'nuvicintayati / ko dharmavatsalo dharmaparāyaṇo dharmacaraṇo 'sti kasminn iti / ta

children.text: kṣaṇāt smṛtya darśitam ity uktam / darśito dharmacaraṇo dharmavatsalo dharmaparāyaṇo dharmadakṣo nāma rājā asti / taṃ dharma
/ tatra prāsāda-m-ekam asti / tasmin tiṣṭhati / sa tato 'nekadharmakathanena sthitavān / taṃ sarvajanā

body.text: Avk_P_8. atha dharmadakṣo mahārājā sarvavṛttāntam anumataṃ śrutvā

children.text: vicāram ādareṇa sagauraveṇa mahotsavena rājakule praveśayati vāsanabhaktena pratiṣṭhāpayati / atha śāriputro rājānam āśīrvacanam abravīt / saddharma
kurutāṃ mokṣaṃ sarvakāmā bhavantu vaḥ / atha sa rājā praharṣeṇa āśīrvacanam āka
ṇya śāriputram evam āha / vibho śāriputra katham āśīrvacanaṃ tava / kaś ci
buddho vā devo vā devī vā maheśvaro
tām iti dadāsi / saddharmaṃ na jānāmi bhagavan saddharmaṃ bhāṣatu mahāmate /

na kuryād iti sevyate viśrāmaṃ na kuryād iti viśrāmaṃ kriyate tasya phalaṃ kathaṃ doṣabahulam / śāriputra uvāca / nidrāviśrāmaṃ kriyate yena daśāṃśaṃ phalam āpyate / atha rājovāca / bho śāriputra vratarājasya phalahīnabhūtam ittham / asyopāyam asti kiṃ vā na vā / śāriputra uvāca / mahārāja tasyopāyam asti / kiṃtu dharmadhātu

body.text: Avk_P_21. saptaparvatāni mṛttikākarṣāni vāparāṇi vāparaśatāni palasahasrāṇi vā palāyutalakṣaṃ vā tathaiva sa

children.text: khyām api kalām api śaktaṃ mayā / na ta ahorātravratarājasya phalaparyantaṃ śakyate / evaṃ mahārāja aprameyaphalaṃ vratarājasya anyena kim / evaṃ mahārāja dharmadakṣa saṃpūrṇaphalabhūtasya dharmāṇāṃ saptabhāgaikabhāgaṃ bhūpataye / ekabhāga
deśavāsināṃ caturbhāgān vratinām / evam eva bhāgapramāṇaṃ mahārāja /

body.text: Avk_P_22. rājovāca / sādhu mahābhijña vratānāṃ vratam uttamaṃ vratarājam iti khyātaṃ satyam eva mahāmate / mamābhilāṣo 'bhūt samyak kariṣyāmīti niścaya

children.text: śatijanādīn sarvān saṃnipātya mahācaityaṃ kāritavān / śāriputreṇa yathādeśitaṃ sarvavidhīn sāmagrī
sajjīkṛtya sthitavān / tato dinān prerayām āsa / tadādisamāgatapadakādi
sthāpitam / caturdaśyām upavāsasthito bhūtvā madhyāhne dīpadānaṃ dīyate dharmadhātau / tato mukhaprakṣālanādikaṃ kṛtvā śāriputravyākhyānaṃ saṃpūrṇa

Avk_P_25. kva cin mahārāja mahāmatir nāma bodhisattvanirmitaṃ tapovanaṃ gate

children.text: caityam ekam asti / mahātavī nāma sarasī punar ekam asti / tatra nāganāginī prativasati / taccaityāśramaḥ atiramaṇīyo vividhapuṣpaparipūrṇaḥ saṃchanno babhūva / tasmiñ caitye pañca ṛsayo nānāsvādhyāyajapatapabhaktitaḥ pūjitavān pratidinam / tatra ekasmin dine nāganāginī nāgau tatra ṛṣim eka

vedayan śapitavān / he nāganāginyau kimarthaṃ daṃśitaṃ mām / saptakhaṇḍaṃ bhavantu vināśau / tato nāgīnāgau śapitamātreṇa sapta śambukā janmāntare babhūvuḥ / evaṃ paribhramyamāne śambukā nāgajanme nityaṃ caityadarśanayā pūrvajanmavṛtti
cit caityabhaktaṛṣidaṃśitenāham itthaṃ śambukājanmam anubhūtaṃ vyākulībhūtam / tataḥ kṣetre dhānyastambakaṃ caityam iti smṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ paribhramanti /

body.text: Avk_P_26. tataś caturthakena dinena śambukā kīrakī
